page.title: 02INGOLDSBY SCHOOL
page.content: { {INGOLDSBY SCHOOL {Ingoldsby C.P.School was built in 1879 {The first headmaster was called James {Martin who opened the school on {November 3rd.33 children started when {the school opened.On the 10th of {November the number on roll had gone {up twenty to 53.In those days the {school was very different.If you had {alot of time off school you were {disqualified. } Since the school opened there have been 12 headteachers.Many of the headteachers stayed for 20 years. Our present headteacher is Miss Reed there has only been one other headmistress, during the second world war, her name was Miss Clark.
